title: Superhero Template
longDescription:
April 2024 Roadmap Update:

The next update is currently still in development. Changes in my personal life have led me to slow down on the updating process due to having to focus on other means of work. However, the new update will be released as soon as it's ready. With it comes new abilities, system improvements, a main map redesign, skill tree improvements, and new static meshes. This update will officially be version 2.0 of the project. Later on, the project will also be launching with custom animations to replace current animations as well as feature new animations. After this update, The 3.0 update will also feature a more in-depth combat overhaul as well as the first boss, who will fight with their own superpowers. A new class selection system will also be made available in 3.0 or the update following. This class selection system will lean in more heavily to the RPG mechanics in place to give users more customization towards their powers. The documentation for each update will also be updated to include directions on how to integrate new features into existing user projects of earlier builds.


Please bear in mind that the overall price of the project will increase when each new update becomes available. These prices may fluctuate based upon the work put into each new update.


Thank you to everyone who has supported the project!



UPDATE ONE now available.


What's included in the new update:

1.) Improved Dialogue and Quest System.

2.) Added EXP and Leveling System.

3.) Added a simple Skill Tree system that gives you Skill Points every level.

4.) Added Enemy Spawner to keep testing out your abilities.

5.) New power, Make Armor, which lets you make objects automatically rotate around you for a duration of 10 seconds. This will block incoming projectiles and can be used to ragdoll enemies.

6.) Create Clone is now capable of combat and will seek out nearest enemy upon spawning.

7.) New Static Meshes.

8.) General bug fixes.


Updated Documentation and Free Update preview video available soon.


Showcase Video: Superhero Template Showcase for Unreal Marketplace - YouTube

Documentation: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1U9b6qrjzfl0uHCDAiyFDV5nxNOd-pKFq/view?usp=drive_link


A full project template that can be used for your next superhero or supervillain project. It was created in mind for ease of access for beginner and intermediate creators alike.


Includes a melee combat system with a ground attack and combo compatibility, a flight locomotion system with custom VFX and an air dash system for better maneuverability in air, a simple quest and dialogue system, and five different superpowers.


The list of powers include:


  1. Super Speed and Super Jump
  2. Slow Time
  3. Create Clone
  4. Camouflage
  5. Control Enemy
  6. Make Armor



Please Note: This project does NOT include the animations, Skysphere, or targeting system in the Showcase video linked above. They were included in the video merely to showcase what this pack could become when leveraged with other professional assets. However, there is a list of animations used as well as Mixamo alternatives provided in the documentation. I also have provided links to all assets used in the showcase project in the description of the Showcase Video.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Six different superpowers
  •  Flight Locomotion
  •  Melee Combat
  • Health and Superpower Charge Systems
  • Simple Dialogue and Quest Systems with Quest Rewards.
  • Level system with Skill Points

Number of Blueprints: 28

Input: Keyboard, Mouse

Network Replicated: No

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: No

Documentation: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1U9b6qrjzfl0uHCDAiyFDV5nxNOd-pKFq/view?usp=drive_link

Important/Additional Notes:
